main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects were reported in Banning, California in 1956. The objects were described as circular or oval in shape, with some sightings indicating that the object was silvery or light gray in appearance and about the size of a present-day jet fighter. The objects demonstrated unusual flight characteristics, including hovering, changing colors, and moving at high speeds without making any sound.
interesting points: One sighting reported a bright light hovering and changing colors from blue-white to deep red before moving at a high rate of speed.
Another witness observed a circular object with flashing lights that appeared to hover over their house before moving off in a rapid, straight-line motion.
The observed objects were approximately the size of a present-day jet fighter, yet made no sound and demonstrated advanced maneuvering abilities.
The objects were seen to hover, slow down, and move at varying speeds, as well as bank or turn to present their flat side to the observer.
No physical evidence or corroborating witnesses could be reached to establish the sightings, but witnesses were described as credible and reliable.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects (UFOs) with circular or oval shapes
witnesses: multiple credible witnesses, including a pilot
